name: BookMacster Button
description: Empowers Sheep Systems' BookMacster or Markster apps to bookmark the web page you are currently viewing

action.default_title:
Land the current page into BookMacster or Markster.

Your 'option' key controls whether or not Inspector is shown, so you can move or edit your new bookmark.  See Preferences > Adding in BookMacster/Markster.
